info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 7:50AM CDT until March 30 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MARION...SOUTHWESTERN CASS...NORTHWESTERN HARRISON...EASTERN UPSHUR...SOUTHERN MORRIS AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMP COUNTIES... At 749 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Cason to near Cedar Springs to near East Mountain, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gladewater, Gilmer, Daingerfield, Hughes Springs, Lone Star, Ore City, East Mountain, Diana, Jenkins, West Mountain, Cedar Springs, Avinger, Union Grove, Holly Springs, Lafayette and Center Point. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for northeastern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
